title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 57.6 - Effective date
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15 ยง 57.6 - Effective date

State Regulations
(a) On and after February 1, 1972, all hitches manufactured shall fully comply with
this Part. (b) On and after

November 1, 1972, all hitches offered for sale in New York State shall fully
comply with this Part. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 15
ยง
57.6

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
